{"id":509924834,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 2 months","timestamp":1624066255,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"60 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/509924834/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"3Sum Smaller","memory":"13.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int threeSumSmaller(vector<int>& nums, int target) {\n      sort(nums.begin(),nums.end());\n      int ans =0;\n      int n = nums.size();\n      for(int i=0;i<nums.size();i++){\n         // i is the first index and keep it fixed and play with l and r \n          // then increment i again and again play with l and r\n          // also think about r-l as ans why ?\n          int l =i+1;\n          int r= n-1;\n          while(l<r){\n              if(nums[i]+nums[l]+nums[r]<target){\n                  ans+=r-l;\n                  l++;\n              }\n              else {\n                  r--;\n              }\n          }\n      }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"3sum-smaller"}
